item.title: Goldman adds Walmart to September ‘conviction list.’ Here’s who else made the cut
item.description: The stocks are included in the investment bank's "Conviction List - Directors' Cut" group of buy-rated companies.

item.title: Investors can grab double-digit yields with these buy-rated funds, according to Bank of America
item.description: Bank of America says these closed-end funds have attractive yields.

item.title: JPMorgan’s favorite stocks heading into September
item.description: JPMorgan's list of top stock picks heading into May include new additions PTC Therapeutics and Armstrong World Industries.

item.title: Pepsi shares jump as activist Elliott takes $4 billion stake, sees 'historic' value opportunity
item.description: The Paul Singer-founded Elliott's bet in Pepsi is worth $4 billion, becoming the consumer giant's top five active investors excluding index funds.

item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades Lam Research, sees a challenging setup in 2026
item.description: Morgan Stanley sees shares of Lam Research falling 8% from here.
